review: The fire stick is wonderful.  It was easy to install (my son says), arrived as promised and the remote and instructions were easy.  He did have a little difficulty sliding the back cover off the remote.  And be sure to have triple AAA batteries on hand because they weren't included.  However, everything went fine and I'm glad I ordered it.  As a matter of fact, I'm going to order a second one for the bedroom because I'm not tech savvy enough to remove and install in different rooms.
author: lili

review: Pretty handy little device that can make a "non-smart" tv "smart". It is not just a stick though, which is kind of misleading. You have to use an adapter and you also have to plug it into the wall. Came with a free month of Netflix which is nice. Overall, it was worth the money.

review: I would give the Fire Stick 5 stars but I subtracted a star due to annoying device restarts.I have two FireSticks in my home and both of them have a tendency to freeze up and require a reset.I bought two for a reason though. They are well worth ~$40 and have plenty of compatible apps. The device obviously focuses on Amazon Prime. It doesn't support HBO Go. A sad deterrent if you enjoy Game of Thrones.
